Text: What's the verdict? Is this show any good?

Warning - spoilers:
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1804880/synopsis
I haven't seen it (yet), but sounds like a cross between The Mentalist, In Plain Sight, and The Unit, although not in a military setting.
I'm definitely going to check it out.

Okay, forget about The Unit, no resemblance.
Forget about The Mentalist too, she's just a good detective, not a mentalist.

Maybe it's just me, but this episode had a weird feeling to it. Maybe it's all the baby stuff, the kidnapping, sex offenders, and Lori's biological father, all of which took up most of the episode.
Not a good way to start a tv-series.
